data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Form,
        Menu,
        Radio,
        Spacer,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Menu.Container>
    <Menu.Heading>Sort By</Menu.Heading>

    <Form.Group
        logic_name="radio-flush"
        logic_state="ascending"
    >
        <Menu.Label for="radio-flush-ascending">
            Ascending
            <Spacer />
            <Radio
                value="ascending"
                palette="accent"
                variation="flush"
            />
        </Menu.Label>

        <Menu.Label for="radio-flush-decending">
            Decending
            <Spacer />
            <Radio
                value="decending"
                palette="accent"
                variation="flush"
            />
        </Menu.Label>
    </Form.Group>
</Menu.Container>
data.title: Radio Flush
